text:
A US official will start a European tour that will include a visit to Britain and France
02 Nov 2019, 07:51 by ASHA
Manisha Singh, the US assistant secretary of state for economic and trade affairs, will start a European tour from Saturday to Britain and France that will last until November 7, said State Department spokeswoman Morgan Ortagos. It will also meet with British aviation officials to discuss ongoing cooperation between the two countries on commercial aviation issues and will host a round table with airlines and space to discuss the economic empowerment of In Paris, the US official will discuss US priorities with officials of the US mission to the European Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, Ortagos said.
